title: Ep 308 | Jase Robertson's Answer to Shootings and Gun Control
description:
Jase and Phil talk about recent shootings, crime rates in the major cities, why gun control will never work, and what the real solution is. Phil notices that the baptisms he's performed lately all share one similarity, and he wonders if Al's hitchhiking cat is a sign of the end of days. Jase vents his frustrations with movie aliens and explains why he loves a good trash-talking session. Phil tells us how the book of Matthew relates to the world today. And Jase talks about calling the bears when others curse God.
